ygData.subject: Cazi
ygData.msgSnippet: We spent another evening fruitlessly trying to kill Cazic Thule. We keep trying to find a strategy to kill him without slow, as now we can never ever get slow
ygData.messageBody:
We spent another evening fruitlessly trying to kill Cazic Thule. We keep
trying to find a strategy to kill him without slow, as now we can never ever
get slow to land. Does anyone have any hints or tips for this? We think that
he has not been killed on Xegony since he was buffed up.
Evening wasn't a total waste, we cleared the other mobs fairly easy looking
for epic items. Still waiting for the wiz and chanter mobs to show up.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
